post.summary: LinkedIn URL to Person (1 credit per request)
post.description: Enrich person data from a LinkedIn profile URL. **Cost: 1 credit per request**

post.summary: Phone to LinkedIn URLs (1 credit per request)
post.description: Get LinkedIn profile URLs from a phone number. **Cost: 1 credit per request**

post.summary: Email to LinkedIn URLs (1 credit per request)
post.description: Get LinkedIn profile URLs from an email address. **Cost: 1 credit per request**

post.summary: LinkedIn URL to Organization (1 credit per request)
post.description: Enrich organization data from a LinkedIn company URL. **Cost: 1 credit per request**

post.summary: Domain to Organization (1 credit per request)
post.description: Enrich organization data from a company domain. **Cost: 1 credit per request**
Check deliverability, quality, risk, sender details, domain info, and breach history for an email address. **Cost: 1 credit per request.**
Get carrier, location, messaging, validation, registration, risk, and breach data for a phone number. **Cost: 1 credit per request.**

post.summary: List employees at a company by domain (5 credits)
post.description: Return all employees found at the company matching the given domain. **Cost: 5 credits per request.**

post.summary: List employees at a company by LinkedIn URL (5 credits)
post.description: Return all employees found at the company matching the given LinkedIn URL. **Cost: 5 credits per request.**

post.summary: Search by company name and job title (5 credits)
post.description: Find people matching a company name (substring) and job title (substring). **Cost: 5 credits per request.**

post.summary: Search by person name and job title (5 credits)
post.description: Find people matching a first name (exact), last name (exact), and job title (substring). **Cost: 5 credits per request.**

post.summary: Search prospector database (5 credits per request)
post.description: Search the prospector database with user-friendly predefined filters. **Cost: 5 credits per request**

CustomSearchRecord.title: CustomSearchRecord
CustomSearchRecord.description:
A single row returned by any custom search.

Every field is optional so the same model works regardless of which
select-config was used; absent columns come back as ``None``.

total_count_mode.title: Total Count Mode
total_count_mode.description: 'exact' = full count; 'page' = count of this page only.

CustomSearchResponse.title: CustomSearchResponse
CustomSearchResponse.description: Paginated response shared by all four custom searches.

data.description: Full email reputation payload, or null on failure.

ErrorResponse.title: ErrorResponse
ErrorResponse.description: Standard error payload for AppError exceptions.

data.description: Full phone intelligence payload, or null on failure.

page.title: Page

ProspectorMetaRequest.title: ProspectorMetaRequest
ProspectorMetaRequest.description: Request model for getting distinct values of a prospector field.

values.title: Values
values.description: List of distinct values for the field

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: True if there are more values beyond this page

ProspectorMetaResponse.title: ProspectorMetaResponse
ProspectorMetaResponse.description: Response model for distinct values endpoint.

ProspectorRecord.title: ProspectorRecord
ProspectorRecord.description: Prospector record with only the fields enabled in ProspectorLightModel (True values only).

records.title: Records
records.description: List of prospector records returned by the query.

total_count.title: Total Count
total_count.description: Total number of records matching the query across all pages (not just current page).

total_count_mode.title: Total Count Mode
total_count_mode.description: Indicates what total_count represents. 'exact' means the total matching rows; 'page' means count of records returned in this page.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The number of records per page (fixed at 25).

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: True if there are more records beyond this page.

next_page.title: Next Page
next_page.description: If has_more is true, the next page number to request; otherwise null.
